name: CTGT
headline: Entirely New AI Stack: Efficient and Safe Alternative to LLM Ecosystem
description: CTGT is building the next evolution of AI, towards intelligence that is foundationally designed to be efficient and trustworthy. Our enterprise-grade platform prevents AI hallucinations and errors in real-time while maximizing ROI. Based on seminal research that opens the "black box" of AI, we enable Fortune 500 companies to deploy AI with confidence through automated risk prevention, comprehensive audit trails, and institutional-grade security controls. With AI adoption surging to 72%, we help organizations avoid costly mistakes and reputation damage while achieving 99.99% reliability and 10x faster deployment times. Trusted by industry leaders and backed by prominent investors, CTGT transforms AI from a liability into a competitive advantage.
tags: industry:artificial-intelligence; industry:deep-learning; industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:enterprise; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Cyril Gorlla, Founder
founders.description: Cyril Gorlla is the recipient of the Endowed Chair's Fellowship at UCSD. His work on efficient AI training was invited for presentation at ICLR and his talk at Ai4 was the most attended in its track. He collaborated with Intel on ML telemetry deployed on 8M+ CPUs. He was named one of 12 “2022 Shining Stars” at UCSD and is an Ivory Bridges Fellow and Nordson Leadership Scholar. He was advised by ACM and Amazon Fellow Mikhail Belkin.

founders.name: Trevor Tuttle, Founder
founders.description: I was a deep learning researcher focused on high powered distributed ML systems under Hao Zhang, a student of Databricks Founder Ion Stoica, at UCSD. I left my studies to pursue this venture, CTGT, where I am the CTO.

generated_description:
**CTGT Overview**

CTGT is an emerging player in the artificial intelligence landscape, founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator's Batch F24. Nestled in San Francisco, this lean startup boasts a team of two, focused on building a cutting-edge AI platform that emphasizes efficiency and trustworthiness. 

**Mission and Vision**

The company's mission is to create an "entirely new AI stack" that serves as a safe, efficient alternative to the existing large language model (LLM) ecosystem. CTGT aims to empower Fortune 500 companies to deploy AI with greater confidence while preventing hallucinations and errors in real-time. The platform incorporates automated risk management and provides comprehensive audit trails, all backed by institutional-grade security controls. With AI adoption soaring, CTGT seeks to mitigate the costly mistakes and reputational damage associated with flawed AI implementations.

**Key Achievements and Recognition**

CTGT has quickly gained traction, attracting the attention of industry leaders and prominent investors. They report a remarkable achievement of 99.99% reliability in their AI deployments, as well as reducing model deployment times from weeks to mere minutes—asserting a tenfold increase in efficiency. 

**Services and Pricing**

CTGT’s platform facilitates automated risk prevention and enhanced AI governance, crucial as organizations grapple with the rising liability risks tied to AI usage. They offer tiered pricing models—starting at $10,000 per year for basic access, scaling up to advanced solutions that include comprehensive compliance features and multi-model evaluations.

**Testimonials and Impact**

Industry figures like Gonzalo Maldonado, CTO of Mocksi, and Mike Knoop, co-founder of Zapier, have lauded CTGT’s innovative approach, particularly its ability to unlock the opaque world of deep learning. This positions CTGT not just as a service provider, but as a trusted partner in navigating the complexities of AI.

**Conclusion**

In a world where AI's potential is matched only by its risks, CTGT stands out by offering a pathway to safer, more efficient AI utilization. Their work not only enhances operational capabilities but also converts AI from a liability into a significant competitive advantage for businesses ready to embrace their solutions. For more information, visit their website at [CTGT.ai](https://www.ctgt.ai/).
